alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 24 at 9:28AM CDT until October 24 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Wood County in central Wisconsin... Northern Portage County in central Wisconsin... Southern Marathon County in central Wisconsin... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 928 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marshfield, or 17 miles east of Neillsville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Stevens Point, Marshfield, Mosinee, Bevent, Knowlton, Norrie, Hewitt, Sherry, Auburndale, and Jordan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
